about_the_game:
The following features are included in the demo version of Shenanigans:

  • Join LAN and online games with your friends.
  • Customize your character with the Character Creator.

The following features are not included and require the purchased version of the game:

  • Create game presets and custom playing cards or decks.
  • Create your own Steam lobbies and host online or LAN games to invite Friends.
  • Play in singleplayer mode.
detailed_description:
The following features are included in the demo version of Shenanigans:

  • Join LAN and online games with your friends.
  • Customize your character with the Character Creator.

The following features are not included and require the purchased version of the game:

  • Create game presets and custom playing cards or decks.
  • Create your own Steam lobbies and host online or LAN games to invite Friends.
  • Play in singleplayer mode.

name: Shenanigans Friend's Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 or equivalent or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 700 series, equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are estimated. Performance may differ on older hardware.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core I5, equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1000 series, equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Get the Friend's Pass demo version to play with your friends who already own the game.
